title: New: Lists – Millie & Ivor
body:
Those of you with a good memory may remember **Lists** who appeared with a couple of beautiful tracks the best part of two years ago.

Now sharing his debut single proper, the absolutely breathtaking _Millie & Ivor_, it’s clear that he’s returning with real intent. This is a **must** listen.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
